content: **knitted santa/toy in drops lima work from bottom up theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern li-220 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** piece measures approx circumference = 18 cm height = 20 cm **yarn** drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 0206 wheat 50 g colour 3609 red 50 g colour 7810 khaki 50 g colour 8903 black 50 g colour 9015 grey 50 g colour 9023 maroon 1 santa weighs approx 30 g without filling **accessories** some cotton wool for filling **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm **knitting gauge** 22 stitches in width and 30 row vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 3 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm remember remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger sized needles or if you get too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller sized needles -------------------------------------------------------
